Package com.limelight.videosdk.utility

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Downloader.DownLoadCallback
    Callback interface for download.
    OnSuccess return the path of downloaded file
    OnError return the error message
    OnProgress return the progress percentage.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connection
    This class helps in finding the current network status of device.
    If the device is connected, then only ContentService, WidevineManager and Downloader will send requests to Limelight server.
    Downloader
    This class facilitates downloading of widevine offline content and thumbnails associated with media and channels.
    Setting
    This class manages the developer details like organization id, access key and secret.
    Thumbnail
    This class helps in loading thumbnails associated with the channels and media.
